Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Exempts East Syracuse Fire Department from the requirement that the percentage of non-resident fire department members not exceed forty-five percent of the membership
Summary: Exempts East Syracuse Fire Department from the requirement that the percentage of non-resident fire department members not exceed forty-five percent of the membership.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to exempting East Syracuse Fire Department from the requirement that the percentage of non-resident fire department members not exceed forty-five percent of the membership
